name: WorkspaceFile_PostWorkspaceFiles
description: This method adds a file to a workspace.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$block: This object represents an item in a workspace, which can be either a file or folder.

$ul: **callerAuthorization**: Provides properties that describe user authorization to a workspace.
**canDelete**: When **true,** the workspace user can delete items from the workspace.
**canMove**: When **true,** the workspace user can move the items in the workspace.
**canTransact**: When **true,** the workspace user can create transactions from the workspace.
**canView**: When **true,** the workspace user can view the items in the workspace.
**created**: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user authorization was created.
**createdById**: The ID of the user who created the workspace user authorization.
**errorDetails**: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.
**errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
**modified**: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user authorization was last modified.
**modifiedById**: The ID of the user who last modified the workspace user authorization.
**workspaceUserId**: The ID of the workspace user.
**workspaceUserInformation**: This object represents the workspace user. This property is only returned in response to user specific GET call.
**accountId**: The account ID associated with the workspace user.
**accountName**: The name of the account that the workspace user belongs to.
**activeSince**: The UTC DateTime when the user joined the workspace.
**created**: The UTC DateTime when the workspace user was created.
**createdById**: The ID of the user who created this workspace user.
**email**: The workspace user's email address.
**errorDetails**: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.
**errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
**invitationEmailBlurb**: The text of the workspace invitation email message sent to the user.
**invitationEmailSubject**: The subject line of the workspace invitation email message sent to the user.
**lastModified**: The UTC DateTime that the workspace user was last modified.
**lastModifiedById**: The ID of the user who last modified the workspace user.
**status**: Filters the results by user status.
**type**: Type of the user. Valid values: type_owner, type_participant.
**userId**: The ID of the workspace user.
**userName**: The name of workspace user.
**workspaceId**: The ID of the workspace.
**workspaceUserBaseUrl**: The URL for accessing the workspace user.
**workspaceUserId**: The ID of the workspace user.
**workspaceUserUri**: The URI for accessing the workspace user.
**contentType**: If the item is a file, this property specifies the content type of the file.
**created**: The UTC DateTime when the workspace item was created.
**createdById**: The ID of the user who created the workspace item.
**createdByInformation**: This object represents the workspace user. This property is only returned in response to user specific GET call.

**extension**: The file extension of a file item.
**fileSize**: The size of the file in bytes.
**fileUri**: The URI for retrieving the file.
**id**: A unique ID for the Salesforce object.
**isPublic**:  When **true,** the item is public.
**lastModified**: The UTC date and time that the comment was last updated.
**lastModifiedById**: The ID of the user who last modified the item.

**name**: The name of the file or folder.
**pageCount**: The number of pages in a file.
**parentFolderId**: The ID of the parent folder, or the special value `root` for the root folder.
**parentFolderUri**: The URI of the parent folder.

**sha256**: A 64-byte, Secure Hash Algorithm 256 (SHA256) checksum that the caller computes across the entirety of the original content of a file. DocuSign compares this value to its own computation. If the two values are not equal, the original content and received content are not the same and the upload is refused.
**thumbHeight**: The height of the thumbnail image.
**thumbWidth**: The width of the thumbnail image.
**thumbnail**: Description of a page of a document.
**dpi**: The number of dots per inch used for the page image.
**errorDetails**: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.
**errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
**height**: The height of the page in pixels.
**imageBytes**: The number of image bytes.
**mimeType**: The MIME type.
**pageId**: The ID of the page.
**sequence**: The sequence of the page in the document, or page number.
**width**: The width of the page in pixels.
**type**: The type of the workspace item. Valid values are file, folder.
**uri**: A URI containing the user ID.
